chunks.text: Handshake Maggie just messaged you about a job Hello! My name is Maggie, and I am a Manager at iD Tech ( https://www.idtech.com/ ) . Are you looking for a job around New York City  this summer? We are looking for Instructors ( https://www.idtech ... Read more View message Mute iD Tech Hiring Stem Instructors · You received this email because Handshake partners with your school to help you grow your career. Manage email preferences or unsubscribe . P.O. Box 40770, San Francisco, CA 94140

metadata.subject: Hiring Stem Instructors in New York
